snippet: Originating as a carriage house in 1799, the building that now houses the Mount Vernon Hotel Museum & Garden on the Upper East Side later served as a country hotel, and then had turns as a private home and antiques showroom.
abstract: Historic Mount Vernon Hotel Museum & Garden, a popular resort in the era of Andrew Jackson, presents excellent reason to visit Manhattan's Upper East Side; nearby restaurant Marche du Sud provides good lunch spot for visit.
lead_paragraph: Originating as a carriage house in 1799, the building that now houses the Mount Vernon Hotel Museum & Garden on the Upper East Side later served as a country hotel, and then had turns as a private home and antiques showroom.

headline.seo: Mount Vernon Hotel Museum & Garden on the Upper East Side Once Was a Retreat for the Middle Class
headline.content_kicker: Two Good Reasons | Upper East Side
headline.kicker: Two Good Reasons | Upper East Side
